extDescription.message: FluentRead - AI-powered English learning assistant. Simplify complex text, analyze grammar, and learn vocabulary instantly while browsing.

extFullDescription.message:
FluentRead is a powerful browser extension that transforms your web browsing into an English learning experience through AI technology.

Key Features:
• Smart Simplification - Convert complex English sentences into simple, easy-to-understand English
• Grammar Analysis - Visualize sentence structure (Subject-Predicate-Object)
• Vocabulary Learning - Smart vocabulary detection with simple definitions and translations
• Complete Translation - Accurate translations for selected text

Perfect For:
• English learners (A1-B2 level)
• Developers reading technical documentation
• Non-native speakers wanting to improve their English

Privacy Commitment:
• All data stored locally, not uploaded to our servers
• Only uses your configured API key to call LLM services
• Your text content is used for real-time analysis only, not stored
